In the second<S>8147</S> year<S>8141</S> of Darius<S>1867</S> the king<S>4428</S>, in the sixth<S>8345</S> month<S>2320</S>, in the first<S>259</S> day<S>3117</S> of the month<S>2320</S>, came the word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> by<S>3027</S> Haggai<S>2292</S> the prophet<S>5030</S> unto Zerubbabel<S>2216</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Shealtiel<S>7597</S>, governor<S>6346</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, and to Joshua<S>3091</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Josedech<S>3087</S>, the high<S>1419</S> priest<S>3548</S>, saying<S>559</S>, <sup>by: Heb. by the hand of</sup> <sup>governor: or, captain</sup>
Thus speaketh<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S>, saying<S>559</S>, This people<S>5971</S> say<S>559</S>, The time<S>6256</S> is not come<S>935</S>, the time<S>6256</S> that the LORD'S<S>3068</S> house<S>1004</S> should be built<S>1129</S>.
Then came the word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> by<S>3027</S> Haggai<S>2292</S> the prophet<S>5030</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Is it time<S>6256</S> for you, O ye, to dwell<S>3427</S> in your cieled<S>5603</S> houses<S>1004</S>, and this house<S>1004</S> lie waste<S>2720</S>?
Now therefore thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S>; Consider<S>7760</S> <S>3824</S> your ways<S>1870</S>. <sup>Consider: Heb. Set your heart on your ways</sup>
Ye have sown<S>2232</S> much<S>7235</S>, and bring<S>935</S> in little<S>4592</S>; ye eat<S>398</S>, but ye have not enough<S>7654</S>; ye drink<S>8354</S>, but ye are not filled with drink<S>7937</S>; ye clothe<S>3847</S> you, but there is none warm<S>2527</S>; and he that earneth wages<S>7936</S> earneth wages<S>7936</S> to put it into a bag<S>6872</S> with holes<S>5344</S>. <sup>with holes: Heb. pierced through</sup>
Thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S>; Consider<S>7760</S> <S>3824</S> your ways<S>1870</S>. <sup>Consider: Heb. Set your heart on your ways</sup>
Go up<S>5927</S> to the mountain<S>2022</S>, and bring<S>935</S> wood<S>6086</S>, and build<S>1129</S> the house<S>1004</S>; and I will take pleasure<S>7521</S> in it, and I will be glorified<S>3513</S>, saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Ye looked<S>6437</S> for much<S>7235</S>, and, lo, it came to little<S>4592</S>; and when ye brought<S>935</S> it home<S>1004</S>, I did blow<S>5301</S> upon it. Why? saith<S>5002</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S>. Because<S>3282</S> of mine house<S>1004</S> that is waste<S>2720</S>, and ye run<S>7323</S> every man<S>376</S> unto his own house<S>1004</S>. <sup>blow: or, blow it away</sup>
Therefore the heaven<S>8064</S> over you is stayed<S>3607</S> from dew<S>2919</S>, and the earth<S>776</S> is stayed<S>3607</S> from her fruit<S>2981</S>.
And I called<S>7121</S> for a drought<S>2721</S> upon the land<S>776</S>, and upon the mountains<S>2022</S>, and upon the corn<S>1715</S>, and upon the new wine<S>8492</S>, and upon the oil<S>3323</S>, and upon that which the ground<S>127</S> bringeth forth<S>3318</S>, and upon men<S>120</S>, and upon cattle<S>929</S>, and upon all the labour<S>3018</S> of the hands<S>3709</S>.
Then Zerubbabel<S>2216</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Shealtiel<S>7597</S>, and Joshua<S>3091</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Josedech<S>3087</S>, the high<S>1419</S> priest<S>3548</S>, with all the remnant<S>7611</S> of the people<S>5971</S>, obeyed<S>8085</S> the voice<S>6963</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> their God<S>430</S>, and the words<S>1697</S> of Haggai<S>2292</S> the prophet<S>5030</S>, as the LORD<S>3068</S> their God<S>430</S> had sent<S>7971</S> him, and the people<S>5971</S> did fear<S>3372</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Then spake<S>559</S> Haggai<S>2292</S> the LORD'S<S>3068</S> messenger<S>4397</S> in the LORD'S<S>3068</S> message<S>4400</S> unto the people<S>5971</S>, saying<S>559</S>, I am with you, saith<S>5002</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> stirred up<S>5782</S> the spirit<S>7307</S> of Zerubbabel<S>2216</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Shealtiel<S>7597</S>, governor<S>6346</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, and the spirit<S>7307</S> of Joshua<S>3091</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Josedech<S>3087</S>, the high<S>1419</S> priest<S>3548</S>, and the spirit<S>7307</S> of all the remnant<S>7611</S> of the people<S>5971</S>; and they came<S>935</S> and did<S>6213</S> work<S>4399</S> in the house<S>1004</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S>, their God<S>430</S>,
In the four<S>702</S> and twentieth<S>6242</S> day<S>3117</S> of the sixth<S>8345</S> month<S>2320</S>, in the second<S>8147</S> year<S>8141</S> of Darius<S>1867</S> the king<S>4428</S>.
